author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...AIR FORCE HURRICANE HUNTERS FIND IMELDA HAS STRENGTHENED... ...EXPECTED TO BRING HURRICANE-FORCE WINDS, DAMAGING WAVES, AND FLASH FLOODING TO BERMUDA LATER TODAY AND TONIGHT...
summary: ...AIR FORCE HURRICANE HUNTERS FIND IMELDA HAS STRENGTHENED... ...EXPECTED TO BRING HURRICANE-FORCE WINDS, DAMAGING WAVES, AND FLASH FLOODING TO BERMUDA LATER TODAY AND TONIGHT... As of 11:00 AM EDT Wed Oct 01 the center of Imelda was located near 31.0, -70.4 with movement ENE at 20 mph. The minimum central pressure was 966 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 100 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...AIR FORCE HURRICANE HUNTERS FIND IMELDA HAS STRENGTHENED... ...EXPECTED TO BRING HURRICANE-FORCE WINDS, DAMAGING WAVES, AND FLASH FLOODING TO BERMUDA LATER TODAY AND TONIGHT... As of 11:00 AM EDT Wed Oct 01 the center of Imelda was located near 31.0, -70.4 with movement ENE at 20 mph. The minimum central pressure was 966 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 100 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Imelda (AT4/AL092025)
